content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-15, 25)
Consists of steam engine (position -15, 25) and boiler (position -15, 24)

### Electric Pole at position(-15.5, 25.5)
Consists of electric pole (position -15.5, 25.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to undefined entities
- Ensure that all entity names are correctly defined and imported before use. In this case, 'Lab' was not defined, leading to a NameError.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
